venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Want to learn how big companies like Amazon, Facebook and LinkedIn are developing their software?

Continuous deployment drives innovation in software development while reducing operational risk. Faster feedback cycles and quick iterations enable you to build a better product in less time.

 

Florian Motlik, CTO of Codeship, will talk about the benefits and challenges of continuous deployment with people who have lived this practice for many years. Including:

 


Dan Rowe from Etsy, who as a Dev Engineer with more than 10 years of experience will talk about what continuous deployment means for a wildly successful and well known company.

Amos Benninga, Chief Architect for GrabCAD -- leaders in the Open Engineering movement; GrabCAD helps engineers get products to market faster by connecting people, content and technology.

 

 

 

Ken Eimer is a Software Architect and first hire at InsightSquared -- a SaaS business intelligence product for small and medium sized businesses, where their continuous deployment strategy has been in use and evolving since launching in 2011.
item.how_to_find_us: Sign in with security and head up to the 1st floor
item.name: Continuous Deployment: Better software, faster
